remarks: The induced metric on a subspace in terms of the induced metric on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspims.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspims.d $e |- D = ( IndMet ` U ) $.
sspims.c $e |- C = ( IndMet ` W ) $.
sspims.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspimsval $p |- ( ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) /\ ( A e. Y /\ B e. Y ) ) -> ( A C B ) = ( A D B ) ) $.
